subject: Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
Olympic Games (2008)
Horses
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The equestrian sport of eventing received a much-needed reprieve Monday at the Olympics when the cross-country portion of the event concluded with no riders or horses seriously injured.
snippet: The equestrian sport of eventing received a much-needed reprieve Monday at the Olympics when the cross-country portion of the event concluded with no riders or horses seriously injured.
